General.Name: Microcosm Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Microcosm Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of functional polyimides and cutting-edge films in Taiwan. It offers liquid photosensitive PI insulation, customized transparent polyimide, low phase difference, and bending resistant, and high modulus transparent polyimide for display materials; positive and negative photosensitive, and RDL alkali soluble and peelable PI for semiconductors. The company also provides FPC/PCB materials, including photosensitive dielectric insulating, 5G high-speed FPC material, flex board material, and spray type solder mask ink products. Microcosm Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 8, Nanke 9th Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 741
